name: FNF - Everywhere at the End of Funk
name_original: FNF - Everywhere at the End of Funk
description:
DISCLAIMER:

This mod may be disturbing to some as it features the following...
- Themes of dementia/memory loss, everywhere at the end of time
- Potentially disturbing audio (old-timey audio with a lot of static?)

If you find yourself thinking you might get upset about these following themes, do not download or click off and find another fun mod to download.

The Modpack Includes:

- New Boyfriend sprites (only up to week 3 and week 6)
- Removing Girlfriend from the game completely
- Custom dialogue
- Custom tracks (from "Everywhere at the End of Time")
- Custom missnote sounds
- Custom charts for Week 1, Week 6 and the Tutorial
- Custom interface (new bg menu, notes, combos, campaign menu ui)

NOTE: There is NO difference between easy, normal or hard... they are merely just pure carbon copies of themselves

OTHER NOTE: All music except from Week 6's 8-bit covers belong to The Caretaker, please go support him here:
https://thecaretaker.bandcamp.com
